name: verify-bitcoin-message
description: A dependency-free Bitcoin message signature verifier that works in browsers

scripts.build:js: bun build verify.ts --outdir . && bun build cli.ts --target=node --outdir . && bun build cli.ts --compile --outfile verify-bitcoin-message
scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:browser
scripts.postinstall: bun test verify.test.ts && bun run build
